dict.acceptation: 友好的，亲密的；有帮助的；互助的；

sent.orig: Friendliness is a subderivative from friendly which is derived from friend. friendliness.
sent.trans: 是来自friendly的次衍生字，而friendly是由friend衍生而来的。

sent.orig: There are toddler-friendly versions of the most famous Bible stories.
sent.trans: 还有最著名的《圣经》故事的“儿童友好(toddler-friendly)”装。

sent.orig: Hogan: What? Friendly competition? Competition is never friendly.
sent.trans: 什么？友谊比赛？比赛不可能友好。

sent.orig: Other places may be mum-friendly when it comes to money but dad-friendly on child custody.
sent.trans: 有的国家在财产问题上会更偏向女方，但在子女抚养问题上则要偏向男方。

sent.orig: Oulejie will continue to strive for innovation and development of new, friendly and user friendly products.
sent.trans: 欧乐洁将再接再厉，不断创新，努力开发出更新颖、更环保、更实用的产品。
